text.p: RailAmerica Inc said Tuesday it extended the date on which it intends to repurchase its outstanding Class B callable stock purchase warrants to April 15.
If Class B warrants were not exercised by the close of business on April 15, the company said it would buy them at $0.05 per warrant.
Under the warrant terms, RailAmerica may repurchase the warrants when the trading price of the company's common stock exceeds $5.6875 per share for a period of 20 consecutive trading days.
Each Class B Warrant entitles the holder to buy 1.3 shares of the company's common stock at an adjusted price of $3.50 per share.
The Class B Warrants were originally issued by the company in connection with its 1992 initial public offering.
